==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=胡说}}

===Etymology===
Attestable from at least the Eastern Jin dynasty (317–420). Literally, "to speak in the manner of the northern and western barbarians", in contrast to the dominant Han rulers. <ref>{{cite-book|author=文若愚|title=语言常识全知道|publisher=中国华侨出版社|year=2014}}</ref>
